Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory199.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The search for Liv continued, but we unexpectedly found the castle of another Demon General.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'So what do we do now? Shall we enter the castle, or keep moving?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm not too sure either. What do you think, Commandant?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Move away', 3: '10', 4: 'Explore inside the castle', 5: '14'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I agree with Commandant. Liv would not enter such a dangerous place alone.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'No, the best option now is to go inside the castle.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I agree. I have never met any Demon Generals.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "We—I mean, 【kuroname】—you have a piece of the Goddess' artifact, don't you?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Karenina knew Camu gave me a fragment after defeating the Demon General. I didn't know why he did that, but that meant neither team could have the complete artifact."}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Anyway, I have been to two Demon General's Castles. Honestly, the traps and the Demon Generals themselves were pretty weak.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'If they ever find this place, the artifact will be taken within an instant. So we must take initiative and get the artifact first.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We take control of the key item. Is that what you mean, Karenina?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hmph, I'm not going to explain it again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '【kuroname】, do you remember what the first Demon General said? He had this "perception" that allowed him to monitor the surroundings of the castle.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'The second Demon General also said something similar. I think they should have the ability to know who passed by, at what time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Really? What are you, a gold fish?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Whatever. I think the Demon Generals must have a surveillance system to monitor everything happening around their castles.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'So we can get the artifact and ask the Demon General if Liv had ever visited this place. Awesome quest chain design!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I see... If we have never been inside a Demon General's Castle, we wouldn't arrive at this conclusion.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The design of this game is truly amazing.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui was all hyped up while Lee was impressed by the game design. Lucia shook her head at the two males as they seemingly immersed themselves in the game.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's head toward the top of the castle, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
